name: Grimly grim
description:
GRIMLY_GRIM[3mx_digital 2022] v0.0

15th Code a game comp {It's all about you} Sept 27th to Dec 5th 2022

*You Are The Villain <-selected option

*You're Not Supposed To Be Here

*You Can’t Stop

CONTROLS:

LEFT,RIGHT arrow keys = MOVE

UP arrow key = JUMP

DOWN arrow key = THROW

EXTRA = at the Title screen Hit{UP_KEY} to continue.

[STORY]

Grim's been abit lazy as of late, now the boss is upset with him.

The only way to fix this is to go out there and get souls, to bad for the people grim has

to get them from.

[HOW TO PLAY]

Throw your Scythe at a victim with the [DOWN] key then quickly grab it before the soul reaches the roof.

Be careful, if the soul hit's the top of the screen it turn into a blue flame which will destroy grim if touched.

Get all the souls in the stage to open the exit.
